mgci.jhdap.shogi

Class StatsPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • mgci.jhdap.shogi.StatsPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class StatsPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The JPanel containing all of the statistics for the shogi GUI, including the move history, and the PlayerPanes with the timers and player names.
    Author:
    Jiayin Huang, Dmitry Andreevich Paramonov
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
